column4: na ɔmaa migyinaa me nan do; na metsee nyia ɔrekasa kyerɛ me no."

column5: amanaman etuatsewfo a wɔatsew mo do etua no nkyɛn: hɔn na hɔn egyanom afom me
column6: dze ebodu ndɛ da yi ara mpo."

column2: "Na mba no yɛ enyiammbɔho na akomadzen; morosoma wo hɔn nkyɛn: na akɛse hɔn dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye yi."

column6: ) wobohu ara dɛ saa nkɔnhyɛnyi bi aba hɔn mu."
kaansa nkɔkrɔw na nsoɛ wɔ wo nkyɛn
column7: na etse nyankomaketsembowa mu ara mpo a: mma nnsuro hɔn nsɛm
column8: eso mma wo bo nntu wɔ hɔn enyim
column9: kaansa wɔyɛ etuatsew fi mpo a."

column4: sɛ woenntsie o: na wɔyɛ etuatsewfo dodow."
tsie dza meka kyerɛ wo yi; mma nnyɛ etuatsewnyi dɛ etuatsew fie no: bue w'anomu
column5: na dzi dza medze rema wo yi."

column4: wɔatsen nsa bi wɔ mo do; na

column2: "na ɔtserɛɛw mu wɔ m'enyim; na wɔakyerɛw no mu na n'ekyir: na wɔakyerɛw sukwadwom
